event.title: "Functional package management with GNU Guix" at Open Tech Summit in Berlin, Germany

body.p: On May 14 will be the Open Tech Summit, a one-day conference about Free Software, free knowledge and open hardware in the Kalkscheune in Berlin. On this occasion, Ricardo Wurmus will give a talk about "Functional package management with GNU Guix" and FSFE will be present with a booth.
